name: Opening Social
description: Lucid will be partnering with us to kick off the semester! They'll be bringing a tech presentation, swag, prizes, and dinner!

name: Lunch meeting
description: Come for a lunch meeting with Podium.

name: Resume Workshop
description: Come get advice from recruiters to prepare for your next software engineering internship or job!

name: Recruitment Dinner
description: Sit down and enjoy a catered meal with industry recruiters. This is a great opportunity to network!

name: Programming Competition
description: This is a contest between BYU, USU, and the U of U. Check back for updates as we get closer to the event.

name: TheYHack
description: TheYHack is BYU's first 24-hour Hackathon! See the event page for more information!

name: Closing Social
description: This will be the last event of the semester.

name: Pirate Challenge
description: A series of difficult challenges for the summer designed to test your skills! Finish all of them for a prize.
